external_references.description: Schroeder, W., Warner, J., Nelson, M. (n.d.). Github PowerShellEmpire. Retrieved April 28, 2016.

description: [Empire](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0363) can use New-GPOImmediateTask to modify a GPO that will install and execute a malicious [Scheduled Task/Job](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1053).(Citation: Github PowerShell Empire)
